FAIRTIQ | Bern, Switzerland | Data Science Intern / Data Scientist | ONSITE | EU-Passport holders only

At FAIRTIQ we are aiming to simplify ticketing solution for public transport. FAIRTIQ has been successfully in use since 2016 in a growing number of tariff communities across Switzerland.

We are currently looking for a data science intern / data scientist to join our research team. Details about position here: https://fairtiq.com/perch/resources/jobpostingdatascience.pd... More about the company: https://fairtiq.com
